original_text: Then they led Jesus from the house of Caiaphas to the governor's headquarters. It was early morning. They themselves did not enter the governor's headquarters, so that they would not be defiled, but could eat the Passover.
korean_text: 그들이 예수를 가야바에게서 관정으로 끌고 가니 새벽이라 그들은 더럽힘을 받지 아니하고 유월절 잔치를 먹고자 하여 관정에 들어가지 아니하더라

sentences.original_text: Then they led Jesus from the house of Caiaphas
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들은 예수를 가야바의 집에서 이끌고

sentences.original_text: They themselves did not enter the governor's headquarters,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 자신은 총독의 관저에 들어가지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: so that they would not be defiled,
